messages.subject: handling kids differently
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/2/2000 2:50:26 AM US Mountain Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/2/2000 2:50:26 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:

<< So my question is does anyone have any
suggestions as to how to handle situations that arrise when DH is
dealing with the children in a manner that I totally disagree with
and the children aren't used to, simply because they are use to the
way I handle things since I am the one who is home all day and night
and DH works all day and all night? Corallyn
>>

Steve and I decided that even if we disagree with each other on something we
don't discuss our disagreement about the kids in front of them. We disagree
about other things so they can see how to resolve disagreements, but not when
it concerns them as they can see it as divide and conquer.

Dawn F
Tucson, AZ
